properties.description: Object with references to relevant element nodes
properties.name: _refs

properties.description: String to be used internally to link a tab to its content
properties.name: name

properties.description: String to be used as a visual text for the tab
properties.name: tabTitle

methods.description: Assigns a tab order for the tab
methods.name: _assignOrder

methods.description: Assigns an id among other properties.
methods.name: _assignProperties

methods.description: Creates the vc-panel in which the tabs content will be placed
methods.name: _setupContent

methods.description: Creates all the events for the tab (click, close, drag...)
methods.name: _setupEvents
